tribunal for any breach of their legal rights.

229.70.text:
If you're faced with an
employment tribunal claim,

232.00.text:
the first thing you should do
is seek expert advice.

234.90.text: It's really important that you do so,

237.50.text:
as there are strict time limits to respond
to an employment tribunal claim.

241.50.text:
It's also really important for you
to understand the issues facing your business,

246.00.text:
and to make sure that you understand
the options available to you.

249.80.text:
Employment experts will know exactly
what to do to ensure that you're protected,
